caption: Slow

I cannot say enough about this place. I usually get one of the meat sandwiches and my sister who is a pescatarian usually gets the salmon sandwich. First of all let me just say, that everything I've had here is great, but that salmon sandwich touched my soul. It was absolutely delicious and the salmon was perfectly cooked. They vary the bread they serve it on but I think the Texas toast added something extra. I highly, HIGHLY recommend getting something from these guys. P.S. I also love the names of their sandwiches. Nice way to pay homage to Brooklyn. UPDATE: I had the buffalo shrimp mac & cheese yesterday. DE.LI.CIOUS!! But I also forgot to say their MUFFINS! If you haven't had one before you have to try it. Especially the blueberry.
The BEST sandwiches in Brooklyn!!! They also have amazing customer service. Will definitely be coming back.
Awesome

The guys who work there are nice and the sandwich was spectacular. The sandwich was the size of my forearm and usually I get tired of the taste while eating a huge sandwich, but not this sandwich, I couldn't stop myself. I ate the whole thing and I'm happier for it.
This  is the best sandwich place in Brooklyn  and the owner  and staff are the best. Try  out  their salmon sandwich  and shrimp sliders. And the muffins  are to die for.  This is Staceeeeey

The best sandwich shop in New York city. The guys running the place are so cool and friendly. The sandwich is delicious. You can tell they use quality ingredients. Portions are huge! Highly recommend the Flatbush Avenue, and the meatball parm special when they have it
Great taste!! Popular item was #6 and it didnt disappoint. Thank you for going beyond expected!

I’ve had a lot of amazing sandwiches in my life eating in NYC, but this is probably the best sandwich I’ve ever had! The guys that own the place are friendly, welcoming, and make you feel at home. Old-school Brooklyn vibes that let you know you’re about to have an amazing sandwich. And the Flatbush Avenue definitely didn’t disappoint. The portion size is massive and is two meals worth of food. The size is evident by the fact that I was barely able to take a photo. And don’t let the portion size confuse you, the quality of this sandwich was exceptional. I will be back soon!
To long for one order pick up 👎
May be the best sandwich in Brooklyn. Great people and great food thank you
Awesome food and very friendly!
Best sandwich place in the slope.  Everything down to the pickles are made from scratch!
(Translated by Google) Excellent that place  (Original) Excelente ese lugar

Edit 2020: in my previous review below, I mentioned how the sandwiches were worth the extra $1-2. It's worth mentioning now that prices have raised, so that, for example, the Sterling Place is $14.75. The sandwiches are still really good, but now you have to be prepared to dish out an extra $3-4 over regular delis, and I'm not sure if that's justified.  Always really well made sandwiches. They're also super friendly. If you're willing to spend the extra $1-2, if definitely beats out bodega sandwiches and is a nice actual sandwich establishment. Subs N Stuff around the corner is also really good.

I have had just about every sandwich they make here and they are all absolutely delicious. The muffins and breakfast sandwiches are amazing as well. The owners and staff are all awesome. I highly recommend this place for the food and the people making it.
Amazing sandwiches and amazing staff! :)
If you want a real sandwich, you go here. Sandwiches are giant and everything I’ve had is wonderful. The dudes that run this shop are the best in the business

The Flatbush Avenue sandwich was awesome. Crunchy breading on the chicken cutlets really gave it a fun texture. The only improvement would be a little salt and an acidic ingredient like balsamic glaze.
Great service!!   Amazing!!  definitely my go to spot.
Love this place. Seriously among the best sandwiches you'll ever have. The watermelon juice is a summer favorite.
very good roast beef sandwich

Amazing quality sandwiches crafted with care. I’ve recently been ordering from this lovely little spot and the sandwiches are huge, really creative, and delicious. The staff is also friendly and it’s just a nice local spot. Highly recommend!
Best sandwiches around
This place is on point. Every sandwich is fantastic.

Ordered two Union Street sandwiches , recommended by my girlfriend. Made the trip four stops away on the R train and honestly this has to have been the most Unflavored sandwich I’ve had all year. The chick pea patty really just tasted like raw tofu and was extremely bland. Feel as if the only way to enjoy this place is if I were to eat meat. I hope it’s better in the future, just please work on your meatless sandwiches.
Amazing food and service! Love this place. Highly recommend the #6 Flatbush Avenue sandwich. Love the people and the food!! Definitely check them out!

I live and work nearby, and go here all the time!! LARGE portions, Fresh Ingredients, amazing specials. They have recently updated and upgraded the menu, so there is something for everyone. Even for small bites, like Baked Daily muffins and coffee. There's nothing like this in the area! Follow them on insta to see what the specials are throughout the week. @prospectprovisionsnyc The Shrimp ala vodka is the best thing you will ever eat!! i promise you! Breakfast, lunch, and even for a short dinner, Mark (owner) has you covered!

Prospect Provisions is over the top! You go there thinking you want your "favorite"  lunch and then you smell the delicious aroma from the "special" hits you and your mind quickly changes. You order the "special" and you're hooked forever... until the next delicious aroma hits you!  Love this place!!

I’ve been here several times and love the place! HUGE portions, friendly staff, and awesome sandwiches. It’s fun to go with friends and split a few different options. The salmon sandwich is crazy good. Also love the watermelon juice!
The food here is deliciously enjoyable. This is a new lunch spot whenever I'm on this side of town.

I have always enjoyed Prospect Provisions’ delicious food. However, most recently, I have been able to enjoy my favorite during recovery from back-to-back surgeries, and the staff’s delivery support has made my experience all the more incredible. Thank you so very much.
The Best!!!

This place is amazing! Their sandwiches never disappoint, especially the chicken cutlet sandwich and shrimp parm. It is the perfect spot, especially now that I'm working from home. We all have to support local businesses during times like this!
Best sandwiches and salads Great service Great Food always fresh and tastes amazing LOVE THIS PLACE💯💯💯
Never disappointed here but I just had the Sackett Street and I gotta say WOW. Best in the neighborhood for sure
The Carroll street breakfast sandwich was great and the people that work here are so open and inviting.
Best sandwich ever

Everything I had there approached spiritual experience. I didn't know sandwiches could be so profoundly good. It was emotional, as was the banana nutella muffin. I found myself making involuntary noises and gestures.  go. these folks are doing the lord's work.  Do yourself a favor and eat while it's hot.
This place serves a damn good sandwich! The menu’s fantastic - the specials never disappoint. My only complaint it the damage done to my waistline. ;)

I can not express how great Prospect Provisions is.  Every bite I have had from here is beyond spectacular! BEST Roast beef, corned beef, short rib, and much more!!  Then the daily specials, Chicken cordon bleu, Very best Burgers, ect.     Wednesdays meatloaf sandwich is so amazing,  Wednesday has past Friday as the best day of the week :-)… great Muffins/baked goods/ egg sandwiches Now the are making dinner plates. WOW so good .. try the Short rib dinner special on Thursday, you will love it !
The owner could a hell of a sandwich

Just came here today for the first time, and I know it will be my go-to lunch spot. This is perhaps my new favorite eatery in all of Brooklyn. They have a huge variety of sandwiches to choose from, and all seem amazing. Freshly baked banana Nutella muffins smelled absolutely divine. The service was fast and the sandwiches are enormous, and aren’t super expensive.
Amazing sandwiches with Excellent service! Superior Quality!!
Amazing sandwiches!! Constructed by an absolute artist! Not one ingredient over powers another and loaded with flavor! Fresh! Worth every dollar!
My trip from West End was way worth it. Very happy with the place.

best sandwich shop in Park Slope. quality ingredients. the menu is awesome and the specials are really great. The staff is really friendly and always accommodating. Love this place! would give it 6 stars if i could
Great sandwiches.  Had corned beef on the brioche  (called the 8th street) and loved it. Also had a great time talking to the guys working there as well. Highly recommended!

This is not just my Favorite "Sandwich Shop"  .. it is my favorite place to eat.. The menu is filled with just magnificent eats!  … then it gets better,  The daily specials this Top Chef comes up with, Chicken cordon blue... roast pork with apples...  and on Wednesdays the MOST Amazing Meatloaf ever !! I have it with pecorino fries. I look forward to  Wednesday  more that Fridays now :-). Best Burgers, great Muffins. worth a trip from Anywhere !... wow I forgot to mention the roast beef Start with the # 1
Great sandwiches and coffee.  Nice group of guys too!

If you're looking for some bombing @ss sandwiches you gotta give this place a shot. Guaranteed you'll be coming back for all their sandwiches!! I've tried three of them  and my favorite one is the Montgomery Place (chicken cutlet, NY State cheddar cheese, butter pickles, etc.) Give Mark a chat while you're there, he's super friendly and warm. This place is my favorite sandwich shop in the area and I look forward to going every time I'm in the neighborhood.

I can’t say enough nice things about this neighborhood gem. The sandwiches are fire - I live really close so I have eaten a lot of them lol. The owners/chef and staff are really nice. This place has one of the best low key corned beef sandwiches around.
Best sandwiches in the south slope.
I frequently buddy this spot, and I've yet to be disappointed. Great service, delicious sandwiches and salads. And the muffins are a must try! 🤤
The owners make great, fresh food and they do it better than anyone else in the neighborhood. I crave a sandwich or a bagel from here daily!!!

Love me a good sandwich spot. This place has the local-owned vibe and they’ll take care of you. The Moma of the place cans her own pickles (I believe bread and butter pickles) which is that hint of love that adds to a sandwich. You can also buy the pickles there. Sandwiches are good quality and you can order ahead and pick up no problem, very quick. They also have a 10 (?) stamp card.

Very tasty sandwiches made from fresh and quality ingredients. They don’t skimp on the fillings! There is a great variety of selection on the menu all named after places in Brooklyn. Staff is also super friendly and helpful. Highly recommend for a quick but satisfying meal!
Good food, quick service and friendly staff. Really what more could you ask for?
The breakfast and lunch sandwiches are great. Great portions and the staff is really friendly. A hole in the wall gem.
Amazing sandwiches. Fresh bread, tender meats, tasty sauces. Can’t ask for more in a sandwich. Wish they were open later.
What i was expecting of the service by the individual who was taken the wasn't pleasant but the sandwich was great

Incredible sandwiches. You can't go wrong with anything, but my favorites are the windsor place and the montgomery Place. Their delivery is quick, and their customer service is top notch. Highly recommend
Nice hospitality
My eggs were very undercooked.  The whites were still runny.  I probably won't be going back.

What a sweet place. Not only was my sandwich (The 5th Ave, a chicken cutlet vodka parm) incredibly delicious and so were the garlic pomodoro fries, but when a flash flood took out my half-sandwich, the owner gave me a new one for free. I tipped them well as is customary in such a situation, a real NY understanding. I’ll be coming back here for sure.
Prospect Provisions is definitely going places. Everything on the menu is great so it’s hard to go wrong with whatever it is you’re looking for. Do yourself a favor and check it out!

Great locally owned neighborhood sandwich shop with an extensive menu and super-friendly staff. The sandwiches marry traditional NYC deli with higher end culinary experimentation. Secretly a great place to grab coffee and a muffin on your way to the train, too.
Great service and fantastic food. Mark is excellent at what he does and he'll do his best to make you happy. I'm here at least once a week. My go to is the Montgomery.
Kevin and Mark are amazing. Great food and customer service! Do yourself a favor and try this place. You won't regret it!
Excellent service, food and prices - sandwiches and breakfast are on point!

Prospect Provisions has the best sandwiches in the neighborhood. The sandwiches are made with locally sourced high quality ingredients, they are made with care and attention to detail, and they are delicious. The customer service is always top notch. I've never seen these guys have a bad day. Their service is always prompt and food is made in a timely fashion. The menu has a solid variety of options, including vegetarian offerings. Highly recommended.

The owner/workers are all so kind and friendly here! The sandwiches are incredible and baked goods are exceptional-- but the people who work there just really make my day with how considerate and pleasant they always are. Truly a gem in our neighborhood!
Very nice place very clean good people Kevin C K the guy who serves you your food to the girl who takes your orders all good people I recommend to place I have everything you want and more
This place seriously never disappoints... best sandwiches. Period. Try their meatball sub it’s unreal. Really good people, too.

Amazing experience. Exceptionally friendly service and high quality sandwiches (had the Windsor Place)! The iced coffee is also super tasty and great quality. I’m in trouble with this shop so close by..
Great food!! Love this place!!
Top-notch unique sandwiches several cuts above your standard bodega deli fare. They cook all their own ingredients so everything is fresh and delectable. The bread is also very high quality.
Walked in right as they were closing and didn’t refuse our buniess.  Extremely friendly and the sandwich was on point!  Delicious.  Highly recommended.
Incredible sandwich, incredibly friendly proprietor. We will definitely be back.
Convenient spot. They'll do stuff off menu if they have time.
Amazing sandwiches, nice people, and fast service!

Hands down the most delicious food I have ever eaten. I've been in several times now and I just ask them to surprise me and I have yet to be disappointed. I highly recommend to anyone who works or lives in the area.
Just bought a sandwich here. Amazing. They make their meat in house so it has its own unique flavor and style. Highly recommend.

You can taste the love in their food. The sandwiches are fresh, flavorful and delicious.  The food is made from scratch.  The pickles are made by the owners' mother and was derived from his grandmother's recipe. You can start your day with their wonderful breakfast sandwiches and come home in the evening for a sandwich and/or salad.
I’m there daily. Food is exceptional, high quality and super friendly owners/staff. Great coffee too!
Excellent, fresh sandwiches & salads. Super convenient location!
(Translated by Google) Duh-lish!  (Original) Duh-lish!

Came across this cute artisan sandwich shop while visiting - felt like I was home with the beautiful greenery and open airy feel. It was really hard to choose but I went with the Sackett Street sandwich and I’m so glad I did; flavors were delicious and the au jus brought it all together like a home cooked meal. The Seventh Avenue is next on my list, I need to try the white cheddar fondue! And make sure to get the watermelon juice - refreshing and fruity, yum!
The people working here are really nice, their souls have not yet been broken by this city. Also the sandwiches are great.

Quintessential hipster sandwich spot that manages to make the cliche fresh with fair prices and local charm. While Bagel Factory one block over is still the king for a classic b.e.c. bagel, Prospect Provisions offers breakfast sandwiches featuring fun add ons like pulled short ribs and cacio e pepe. The staff is warm and inviting, and the shop itself has all the succulents-in-mason-jars aesthetic one would expect in Brooklyn. Overall, a very welcome addition to the neighborhood!
